verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shubhavartha vintimi Yesu raksinchunu Ellavaaru vinanee Yesu rakshinchunu Prabhu maata vintire adi parvavatambulan Daati prakatinchudi Yesu rakshinchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Odanekki povudi Yesu rakshinchunu Daiva brashtu lellarin Yesu rakshinchunu Dweepavasulandaru vinunatlu chaatudi Divya vartamaanamu Yesu rakshinchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Iha badhanundiyu Yesu rakshinchunu Parama bhaagyamichunu Yesu rakshinchunu Deena shrestulellaru bhoonivaasulandaru Ee suvaartha vinudi Yesu rakshinchunu{/lang-eng}
